item.title: 调查人员全面解除 Telegram 首席执行官的法国旅行禁令
item.description: Telegram 亿万富翁首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）的旅行禁令已被法国当局完全解除，因为法国当局正在调查他的信息平台。【原文：Telegram billionaire Chief Executive Officer Pavel Durov’s travel ban has been fully lifted by French authorities investigating him over his messaging platform.】

item.title: 创始人基金支持为管道工和屋顶工带来人工智能的初创公司
item.description: 多年来，大公司一直在各种可能的产品中植入人工智能软件。现在，Founders Fund 正在支持一家初创公司，该公司也希望帮助小型企业使用人工智能技术。【原文：Large companies have been stuffing artificial intelligence software into every possible product for years. Now, Founders Fund is backing a startup that wants to help small businesses use the technology, too.】

item.title: 优步（Uber）让乘客预订前往滑雪胜地的行程，以此作为优步推广活动的一部分
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is expanding the availability of its reserved rides option to include popular ski destinations, part of a larger effort to lure wealthy consumers toward more premium services.】

item.title: 纽约银行为稳定币发行商推出新货币市场基金
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（Bank New York Mellon Corp）正在为需要遵守最近签署的美国稳定币法律的稳定币发行商推出一款货币市场基金。【原文：The Bank of New York Mellon Corp. is launching a money-market fund tailored to issuers of stablecoins who need to comply with a recently signed US stablecoin law.】

item.title: MoonPay 加入稳定币热潮，推出发行业务
item.description: 加密支付公司 MoonPay Inc. 将开始代表客户发行和管理稳定币，因为在美国立法之后，与美元挂钩的代币需求激增。【原文：Crypto payments firm MoonPay Inc. will start issuing and managing stablecoins on behalf of clients, as demand for dollar-pegged tokens has soared in the wake of US legislation.】

item.title: 欧盟议会在广泛压力下推翻 ESG 规则
item.description: 在来自集团内外的巨大压力下，欧洲议会周四投票决定大幅缩减集团的环境、社会和公司治理报告和尽职调查规则。【原文：The European Parliament voted on Thursday to dramatically wind back the bloc’s rulebook for ESG reporting and due diligence following intense pressure, both from within and from outside the bloc.】

item.title: 特朗普正在帮助大石油公司重返勘探领域
item.description: 在白宫的帮助下，埃克森公司和雪佛龙公司正在加紧寻找更多的原油。【原文：Exxon and Chevron are ramping up the search for more crude with a little help from the White House.】

item.title: 到期日临近，Achilles Capital 面临债权人压力
item.description: 随着大量债务到期，瑞典投资公司 Achilles Capital AB 面临着来自债券持有人越来越大的压力。【原文：Swedish investment company Achilles Capital AB is facing mounting pressure from its bondholders as a pile of debt comes due.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，人工智能初创企业光标公司融资293亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，生产帮助工程师编写代码的工具 Cursor 的人工智能初创公司以 293 亿美元的估值融资 23 亿美元。【原文：The artificial-intelligence startup that makes Cursor, a tool that helps engineers write code, has raised $2.3 billion at a $29.3 billion valuation, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 资金市场紧张促使华尔街呼吁美联储采取更多行动
item.description: 作为华尔街日常资金的重要来源，12 万亿美元的市场压力骤增，要求美联储采取更有力的应对措施以缓解压力的呼声日益高涨。【原文：Pressures simmering in the $12 trillion market that serves as a critical source of day-to-day funding on Wall Street are spurring a growing chorus of calls for a more forceful Federal Reserve response to ease the pinch.】

item.title: 美国制裁临近，石油交易商利塔斯科开始裁员
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，石油贸易商 Litasco SA 正在开始解雇员工，距离美国对该公司母公司的制裁生效还有几天时间。【原文：Oil trader Litasco SA is starting to terminate jobs with days to go until US sanctions are to come into effect on the firm’s parent company, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: BBVA 聘请顾问审查土耳其保险合作关系
item.description: 据知情人士透露，BBVA SA 正在审查其在土耳其的保险合作关系，因为其与 Eureko Sigorta AS 的现有协议即将到期。【原文：BBVA SA is reviewing its insurance partnership in Turkey as its current agreement with Eureko Sigorta AS is set to expire, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德财富业务推动第三季度业绩增长
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德公司（Brookfield Corp. ）第三季度盈利上升，因为这家加拿大资金管理公司正在推进向投资主导型保险公司发展的计划。【原文：Brookfield Corp.’s earnings rose in the third quarter as the Canadian money manager forges ahead with plans to evolve into an investment-led insurer.】

item.title: 智利央行成员对十月降息持开放态度
item.description: 根据智利央行上一次政策会议的记录，该行一位董事会成员表示，尽管决策者们一致认为存在持续的通胀风险，但他们对讨论在 10 月份下调借贷成本持开放态度。【原文：Chile’s central bank said one board member was open to discussing a borrowing cost cut in October even as policymakers agreed there were continued inflation risks, according to the minutes to its last policy meeting.】

item.title: 扎克伯格权衡过多人工智能数据中心的想法
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将探讨马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）的想法，即如果他的公司建立了太多的数据中心来满足其人工智能需求，它可能会做些什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner looks at Mark Zuckerberg’s musings about what his company might do if it builds too many data centers for its AI needs.】

item.title: 伦敦豪华公寓五折出售，经济衰退加剧
item.description: 伦敦最豪华的新公寓楼之一的一套公寓以约 2,500 万英镑（3,290 万美元）的价格售出，与今年早些时候的要价相比，折扣超过 50%。【原文：A flat in one of London’s most luxurious new apartment blocks has sold for about £25 million ($32.9 million), a discount of more than 50% from the asking price earlier this year.】

item.title: 西班牙央行敦促政府控制支出、抑制债务
item.description: 西班牙央行表示，西班牙应采取措施降低支出，减少目前超过经济产出 100% 的公共债务。【原文：Spain should take steps to lower spending and bring down public debt that currently exceeds 100% of economic output, the central bank said.】

item.title: 欧盟将提出推进美国贸易协议承诺的新计划
item.description: 集团贸易负责人计划在本月晚些时候与美国同行会面【原文：The bloc’s trade chief plans to meet with his US counterparts later this month】

item.title: 政府关门结束将对美国国内生产总值和数据造成冲击
item.description: 随着政府准备重新开张，美国将迎来 V 型复苏【原文：The US is set for a V-shaped recovery as the government prepares to reopen】

item.title: 外卖创业公司 Gopuff 在新交易中估值降至 85 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，快速配送初创公司 Gopuff 已以 85 亿美元的估值融资 2.5 亿美元，与 2021 年一轮融资时的估值相比大幅缩水。【原文：Rapid-delivery startup Gopuff has raised $250 million at a valuation of $8.5 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter — a significant markdown from its value in a 2021 funding round, as the company seeks to grow its services and sustain its financial health.】

item.title: 迪斯尼称电影制片厂的支出影响本季度业绩
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.）公布的销售额低于华尔街预期，并表示包括新片《阿凡达》（Avatar）在内的一系列大制作电影将对其新财年第一季度的业绩造成影响。【原文：Walt Disney Co. reported sales that fell short of Wall Street estimates and said a slate of big-budget films, including a new Avatar picture, will weigh on results for the first quarter of its new fiscal year.】

item.title: 巴西高风险银行债券激增令货币经理人担忧
item.description: 随着投资者追逐近二十年来最高的一些收益率，巴西债券市场蓬勃发展，越来越多的基金经理开始警告投资巴西债券市场的风险。【原文：A growing number of money managers are starting to warn about the risk of piling into a corner of the Brazilian bond market that has boomed as investors chase some of the highest yields in nearly two decades.】

item.title: 新德里爆炸事件后莫迪的反恐新红线提高了风险
item.description: 今年早些时候与巴基斯坦发生冲突后，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）誓言将今后任何针对平民的袭击视为 "战争行为"。这大大提高了周一在新德里发生的致命爆炸的任何报复行动的风险。【原文：Following a clash with Pakistan earlier this year, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi vowed to treat any future attacks on civilians as an “act of war.” That has dramatically raised the stakes for any retaliation to Monday’s deadly explosion in New Delhi.】

item.title: 尼日利亚停止征收燃油进口税，大亨丹格特遭遇挫折
item.description: 尼日利亚暂停对精炼石油产品征收 15%进口税的计划，这对拥有非洲最大石油加工厂的亿万富翁阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）来说是一个挫折。【原文：Nigeria suspended plans to impose a 15% import duty on refined petroleum products, a setback for billionaire Aliko Dangote who owns Africa’s largest oil-processing plant .】

item.title: 高盛为美股失去的十年辩护
item.description:
高盛认为未来十年美国股市的表现将逊于其他市场。【原文：

Goldman Sachs sees US equities underperforming other markets over next decade.

】

item.title: 苹果与腾讯就微信小游戏购买收取 15% 费用达成一致
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司已与苹果公司达成一项协议，据熟悉商谈的人士透露，苹果公司将负责微信小游戏和应用程序的支付，并从微信小游戏和应用程序的购买中抽取15%的分成。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. has agreed a deal with Apple Inc. that will see the iPhone maker handle payments and take a 15% cut of purchases in WeChat mini games and apps, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 存储芯片初创公司为节能技术融资 1 亿欧元
item.description: 德国初创企业 Ferroelectric Memory GmbH 已通过投资者融资和补贴筹集到 1 亿欧元（1.16 亿美元）资金，用于节能存储芯片的商业化。【原文：German startup Ferroelectric Memory GmbH has raised €100 million ($116 million) in investor financing and subsidies to commercialize energy-saving memory chips.】

item.title: 大科技公司的气候战略家感受到人工智能电力需求的压力
item.description:
高能耗数据中心考验着业界到 2040 年实现零碳排放的承诺

【原文：

Energy-hungry data centers test industry’s commitment to go carbon-zero by 2040

】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会文件显示，迈克尔-伯里的 Scion 对冲基金已撤销注册
item.description: Michael Burry 的 Scion Asset Management 已终止在美国证券交易委员会的注册资格。【原文：Michael Burry’s Scion Asset Management has terminated its registration status with the SEC.】

item.title: 欧盟再次调查谷歌涉嫌滥用新闻搜索功能
item.description: 谷歌正在接受欧盟反垄断监督机构的调查，原因是人们担心它不公平地降级了一些新闻结果，这项调查有可能增加其95亿欧元（110亿美元）的欧盟罚款总额，并恶化与特朗普政府的紧张关系。【原文：Google is under investigation by European Union antitrust watchdogs over concerns it unfairly demotes some news results in a probe that risks adding to its €9.5 billion ($11 billion) EU fines tally and worsening fraught relations with the Trump administration.】
